verses.1: A masa thuciamna nangawn in biak zia ding le biak nading mun tawh kisai ngeina na nei tei sam hi.
verses.2: Puanbuk khat kibawl a, a pua nung dei pen Siangtho Mun kici a, tua sungah meivak, sabuai le Ompihna Anlum kikoih hi.
verses.3: Tua Siangtho Mun a kideina zomah Siangtho Pen Mun a kici a dei dang khat om leuleu hi.
verses.4: Tua sungah paknamtui hal nading kham kibawl biakna tau le kham tawh a kizut Thuciamna Singkuang om hi. Tua Thuciamna Singkuang sungah manna anlum a kikoihna kham beel, tehno nei-in a hing Aaronʼ ciangkhut le thukhamte a kigelhna suangpek nihte kikoih hi.
verses.5: Tua Thuciamna Singkuang tung sanah Pasianʼ ompihna lim ahi kherub nihte om a, tua kherub nihte in hehpihna tokhom liimsun uh hi. Hih nateʼ thu tu-in a neng a tawngin i gen khinzo kei hi.
verses.6: Hih bang tengin a kibawl khit ciangin a dei pua nung sungah nisim a nasep uh a sem dingin siampite a lut hi.
verses.7: Ahi zongin a dei sung nung sungah Siampi Lianpen pa bek kum khatin khatvei pai a, theih loh man a, amah le miteʼ khialhna hangin ganhing sisan tawh biakpiakna a bawl hi.
verses.8: A pua nung inn dei a om lai teng a sung nung ahi, a Siangtho Pen Mun a kihong nai lo ahihna thu Kha Siangtho in hong kilangsak hi.
verses.9: Hih bang om zia pen tu hun lai thu a lahna ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian tungah a kipia letsongte le ganhing tawh biaknate in a bia miteʼ lungsim siangsak zo lo hi.
verses.10: Zu le an le pumpi siansuahna ngeina tuamtuamte hi bek a, Pasian in na khempeuh a puahphat hun ma kikal sungteng zat ding ngeina ahi hi.
verses.11: Ahi zongin tu-in a hoih zaw thu a sem ding Siampi Lianpen Khris hong tung khinta a, ama lutna biakbuk pen a kipiangsak tawm, khut tawh a kibawl biakbuk hi loin a lian zaw, a cingtaak zaw mun ahi hi.
verses.12: Siangtho Pen Mun ah a tawntungin a kimang dingin khatvei bek Khris a va lut ciangin biakpiak nadingin keel sisan le bawng no sisante va keng loin ama sisan va keng a, eite adingin tawntung hotkhiatna a hong ngahsak hi.
verses.13: Keel sisan, bawngtal sisan le bawngla kihal tum vute, biakna vai-in a siang lo mite tungah a kitheh ciangin biakna vai-in miteʼ pum tung siangthosak thei ahihleh,
verses.14: tawntung Kha Siangtho hangin Pasian tungah a cingtaak biakpiak nadingin Khris in a piak ama sisan in na tam sem khia zo zaw dinga, a nungta Pasianʼ na i sep theih nadingin bangmahin a kimang lo nasepna panin ama sisan in i lungsim hong siangsak ding hi.
verses.15: Thuciamna masa in a huam khak mite, a mawhna panun a suahtak theih nading uh ngeina om pen a si suak khinta ahih manin, Pasianʼ sap mite in a ciam sa tawntung thupha a ngah theih nadingun Khris in thuciamna thak a hong vaihawm ahi hi.
verses.16: Mi khat in a sih khit ciangin a gamhluah dingin a deih pa lai-in ciamtehin a koih leh a laibawl pa a sih phot ding kisam hi.
verses.17: A laibawl pa a hin lai teng tua lai kizang thei lo a, a sih khit ciangin kizang thei bek hi.
verses.18: Tua mah bangin thuciamna masa zong sisan a kizat ciangin thu suak thei pan hi.
verses.19: Moses in zong mite tungah Thukham sunga om thute a piak lai-in bawng no sisan, keel sisan le tui sungah puknah le tuumul san diahin, tuate tawh Thukham laibu le mite theh a,
verses.20: “Pasian in note tungah a hong piak thuciamna sisan ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.21: Tua banah Moses in Biakbuk le biakna-in a kizang a sunga na om khempeuh zong sisan a theh hi.
verses.22: Thukham kizatna sungah na khempeuh sisan tawh kisiansuah a, sisan a kiluansak khit ciang bekin mawhna kimaisak thei pan hi.
verses.23: A taktak ahi lo vantung limte pen hih bangin siansuahna kibawl hi. Ahi zongin vantung nate in hih sangin a hoih zaw biakpiakna kisam hi.
verses.24: Tua ahih manin a lim ahi mihingteʼ bawl Siangtho Mun sungah Jesu pai lo a, vantung mahmah ah va pai-in Pasianʼ omna ah eiteʼ tangin tu-in amah a va kilaak ahi hi.
verses.25: Kum simin Siangtho Pen Munah Jew Siampi Lian pente amauʼ sisan ahi lo, ganhing sisan tawh a pai zelzel bangun amah va pai themthum lo hi.
verses.26: Tua bangin va pai zelzel hileh leitung piancil a kipanin a va thuak zelzel ding ahi hi. Ahi zongin amah biakna-in a va kipiakna hangin a kimang paisuak a suah theih nadingin mawhmaisak nadingin hun bei kuan ciangin amah khatvei a va kipia hi.
verses.27: Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasianʼ thukhenna a thuak ding ahih mah bangin,
verses.28: mi tampiteʼ mawhna a thuak dingin Khris zong khatvei bek a kipia hi. A nih veina hong kilatkik ciangin mawhna thu tawh kisai nasem ding hi nawn loin, lawptakin amah a ngak mite a hon khia ding ahi hi.
